lead_paragraph: Colorado Avalanche forward Steve Konowalchuk retired yesterday after tests showed he has Long QT syndrome, a genetic disease that can lead to irregular heart rhythms. Konowalchuk, 33, had 171 goals and 225 assists in 790 games over 13 seasons.
